title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
OB: When looking at the report design, I noticed that the property <property name="fileName"/> stores the absolute path, but it should be storing a relative path instead. For example, it currently stores the absolute path as "E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary". Instead, it should store the relative path as "lib1.rptlibrary".
